Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: branka
Reviews.Content: love this phone not exactly like the samsung but close enough great features!!! Worth the $$ I would highly recommend it

Reviews.Title: For small money you can got good cell phone,everything is like Samsung S3 but more cheaper than Samsung ...
Reviews.Author: SAFET
Reviews.Content: Cheap but good cell and I recommendation this item .For small money you can got good cell phone,everything is like Samsung S3 but more cheaper than Samsung .

Reviews.Title: eson h9503 s4 mtk6572 cortex dual core android 4.2.2
Reviews.Author: jennlink
Reviews.Content: This s a great phone for the prize it works like Samsung galaxy s4 it has 8 megapixel but the only thing I don't like about the phone isthat it has no name written on the phone it only says android on the back of the phone except that every thing else works fine.I recommend this phone for any one looking for a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Voloma Gal
Reviews.Content: its very nice and very affordable. everything works fine except for the camera which is 8MP. it doesnt really match the description, but overall, i can recommend this to anyone who would like to have a smartphone that works really well and cheap....thanks eson

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone
Reviews.Author: Robin L Meadows
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my son. He loves the features and found the phone easy to use. We use H2O wireless and had no problems adding minutes to this phone. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: It is what it is.
Reviews.Author: Deentown
Reviews.Content: The first thing you need to know is that this phone is great for the price, but don't expect much for the things that you come a costume to on a daily basis such as taking pictures. The front facing camera sucks. The rear camera is okay if you have a steady hand but still below average for today's phone.

Reviews.Title: Phone sucks
Reviews.Author: Gethro
Reviews.Content: Phone is not good at all its a Chinese phone and a fake s5. Don't buy I regret spending a penny on this phone.

Reviews.Title: Sucks. Don't buy.
Reviews.Author: Sara Simmons
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this phone I had mine less than a week and it started shutting itself off, freezing, won't lock the screen when I press the lock button. The only good thing about it is the shipping it was faster than the time it gave. And the shipping package it came in was a plastic bag type thing not a box with package stuff to keep it secure from damage.
